content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Nesibe. I am glad that you came to see it. Before we discuss the rental price, can you tell me a little bit about yourself and what you are looking for in a rental apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am a student and I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am looking for a 25 square meter apartment. Can you tell me the rental price for this apartment?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I understand that you are a student and looking for a budget-friendly rental option. The apartment you are interested in is 25 square meters and is located in a prime location of the city. Based on the market rates, I am willing to rent the apartment to you for a monthly price of €500. I believe this is a fair and reasonable price for a 25 square meter apartment in the city center. Is this price acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, I agree to the price of €500. I am willing to sign the contract and move in as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I am glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of €500. I appreciate your willingness to sign the contract and move in as soon as possible. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about the rental agreement or the apartment. I will be happy to assist you in any way I can. Once you have signed the contract, you can move in and start enjoying your new home.
name: Heinrich Heine
